short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes image ads from Nepali news website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of gifs and unwanted image ads on nepali news webiste and have horrible experience reading news on those sites?

Then this extension is for your rescue. This will delete those ads for you making your experience smoother.
